data1.Stack: PHP, Ruby, Python, MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL
data1.Resolution: 1. Check the average amount of RAM used by each httpd instance. 2. Remove the Jelastic autoconfiguration mark within the /etc/httpd/httpd.conf file. 3. Decrease ServerLimit and MaxClients values according to the formula: (Total_RAM - 5%) / Average_RAM.
Allocate more RAM to a node - handled services could just require more memory for normal operability.
